channel.title: Runescape has been Updated - Please Reload
channel.description:
Hi, I originally posted this in client help but I'm guessing this is more server related as all of the clients I have tried are now giving me this error. They didn't used to, and I'm not sure what I changed to do this. Actually I reset my router to try and figure out port forwarding (which I can't btw) and then this error started occuring... Here are the command prompts when I run the server and client:
Server: [img]http://i.imgur.com/E4abxwj.png[/img]
& Client Side:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/34ngNJc.png[/img]
This happens whether I run the server and client on the ip shown or 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0. No matter what, now I am getting "Runescape has been updated...."
